        initToaster
      • initToaster(spacing = 10.0'f32): Toaster
  Source   Edit

Basic

var toaster = initToaster(spacing = 10f) # Spacing between toasts
toaster.add(initToast(ToastKind.Info, "I'm a notification full of useful information", title = "Hello"))

# Inside Dear ImGui main loop
...
toaster.draw()

Imports

imnotify/utils, imnotify/icons

Types

Toast = object
  kind*: ToastKind
  title*, content*: string
  creationTime, dismissTime*, fadeInOutTime*: int64 ## In milliseconds. Pass a negative number to dismissTime to disable automatic dismiss.
  padding*: ImVec2
  opacity*, rounding*, width*: float32
  separator*: bool           ## Draw a separator between the title and content
  rightMargin*: float32      ## Space from the right side
  closeBtn*: bool            ## Draw a close button
  Source   Edit 
Toaster = object
  data: seq[Toast]
  spacing*: float32          ## Spacing between each toast
  Source   Edit 
ToastKind = enum
  None, Success, Warning, Error, Info
  Source   Edit 
ToastPhase = enum
  FadeIn, Wait, FadeOut, Expired
  Source   Edit

proc draw(self: var Toaster) {....raises: [ValueError], tags: [TimeEffect].}
Draw all toasts. Call this in your main Dear ImGui loop.   Source   Edit 
proc getElapsedTime(self: Toast): int64 {....raises: [], tags: [TimeEffect].}
Ellapsed time in milliseconds since toast's creation.   Source   Edit 
proc getFadePercent(self: Toast): float32 {....raises: [], tags: [TimeEffect].}
Returns current toast opacity based upon it's phase.   Source   Edit 
proc getIcon(self: Toast): string {....raises: [], tags: [].}
Returns each ToastKind (ForkAwesome) icon.   Source   Edit 
proc getPhase(self: Toast): ToastPhase {....raises: [], tags: [TimeEffect].}
Returns toast fade in out animation phase.   Source   Edit 
proc getTitle(self: Toast): string {....raises: [], tags: [].}
Returns the title or each ToastKind default title if the title is empty.   Source   Edit

               padding = igVec2(10, 10); opacity = 1.0'f32; rounding = 5.0'f32;
               width = 200.0'f32; separator = true; rightMargin = 10.0'f32;
